item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260114)
item.description:
What's New

Fix tone mark position when adding vowels after mark (Free Mark ON)

When Free Mark is enabled, adding vowels after a tone mark was placed

would not re-evaluate the mark position. For example:

  • 'ngof' → 'ngò' (correct, single vowel)
  • 'ngofa' → 'ngòa' (wrong, mark should move to 'a')
  • 'ngofai' → 'ngòai' (wrong, should be 'ngoài')

The fix adds a check to call checkMarkPosition() when a new vowel is

added to a word that already has a tone mark, ensuring the mark is

repositioned according to Vietnamese spelling rules.

Added test cases:

  • testTonePlacementNGOAIMarkBeforeVowel
  • testTonePlacementHOAMarkBeforeVowel
